info.name: Google FLoC Disabled
author: geeknik
info.description: The detected website has decided to explicitly exclude itself from Google FLoC tracking.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: arthur.lutz.im
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 Moved Temporarily Connection: close Content-Length: 154 Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only: default-src https: data: blob: ; object-src https: data: 'unsafe-inline'; style-src https: data: 'unsafe-inline' ; script-src https: data: 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' Content-Type: text/html Date: Fri, 27 May 2022 04:44:19 GMT Location: https://arthur.lutz.im/intro Permissions-Policy: interest-cohort=() Server: nginx Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Sso-Wat: You've just been SSOed X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 302 Found

302 Found

nginx

info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: arthur.lutz.im
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 Moved Temporarily Connection: close Content-Length: 154 Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only: default-src https: data: blob: ; object-src https: data: 'unsafe-inline'; style-src https: data: 'unsafe-inline' ; script-src https: data: 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' Content-Type: text/html Date: Fri, 27 May 2022 04:44:19 GMT Location: https://arthur.lutz.im/intro Permissions-Policy: interest-cohort=() Server: nginx Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Sso-Wat: You've just been SSOed X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 302 Found

302 Found

nginx

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: arthur.lutz.im
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 Moved Temporarily Connection: close Content-Length: 154 Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only: default-src https: data: blob: ; object-src https: data: 'unsafe-inline'; style-src https: data: 'unsafe-inline' ; script-src https: data: 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' Content-Type: text/html Date: Fri, 27 May 2022 04:45:36 GMT Location: https://arthur.lutz.im/intro Permissions-Policy: interest-cohort=() Server: nginx Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Sso-Wat: You've just been SSOed X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 302 Found

302 Found

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: arthur.lutz.im' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://arthur.lutz.im/'
